name: Echo of Woe
description:
We are a small creative team of enthusiasts from Russia engaged in the development of visual novels.

Our first major novel that we are currently working on is Echo of Woe - dark fantasy drama, with detective and horror elements.

The plot tells about a young man named Guillem, who goes to the small trading town of Arminghein, where strange mystical events take place.
As a Minister of the Cross, a member of an organization fighting supernatural threats, his task is to find out what is really happening there and put an end to the menace that have seized the city.

This is not just a demo - it's a complete prologue of the story, an introductory part that will introduce the main character, explain his goals and motivation.

The English translation is not perfect, but we are working on it, and it will be significantly improved by the final version.
However, we hope you will still be able to enjoy exploring our novel.
